mapper.select: select code_ID , code_Name from cm_Code where Code_GBN = #{codeTypeID} and Use_YN = 'Y' order by seq
{ call xp_Common_PlusFinder(#{nLarge, javaType=int,jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN} , #{sMiddle, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN})}
{ call xp_Code_sProcess(#{processID, javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN} , #{process, javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN})}
